content: this is another use for my basic ten stitch method where a narrow strip of garter stitch is joined as you go to create a square of any size fold the finished square so that the corners meet to cover a cushion pad of any size any weight of yarn can be used instructions are given for how to work out how big to make your square for the size cushion you want all my ravelry patterns are free to download but if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to the british liver trust where the money will go to fund research and support the families of children with a liver disease you can do this easily by going to my fundraising page here 1 happy knitting 1 https //www justgiving com/page/frankie-brown
